page.title: 05Local Facilities
page.content: With so few shops in Wolvey we asked Mrs H. how she did her{SHOPPING. "As I say, at one time I could get the {MIDLAND RED}to Hinckley or Coventry but since the motorway opened the Midland Red does not come through Wolvey now. Vanguard Coaches of Bulkington run a service to Nuneaton but it is not very frequent. What I do now is to get my husband to take me to the supermarket in Hinckley in the car and then I can get plenty of shopping at one go." "There have been some tradesmen who come round in vans selling groceries, meat and hardware, paraffin and such like, but they do not come so much now. For those without{TRANSPORT}the County{LIBRARY}van comes round about every 3 or 4 weeks, but many people use the library in Nuneaton.
